answers.answer: Eat lots of peanut butter and cheese...drink lots of G2 Gatorade and water...snack and drink that stuff as much as possible! Relax as much as you can also...I went through the same exact thing and that stuff worked like a charm!
Make sure there is good air flow wherever you spend long periods of time...getting too hot can make you really dizzy really quick
Ive had this along with blurred vision and numbness in my arm, I was told low blood pressure. Keep your fluids up and elevate your legs.
I am 24 weeks and have been feeling the same someone told me to drink a lot of G2 and take alot of rest hope u feel bette
Evrey Now and then have something fizzy or with sugar in, you could lack energy and just go dizzy, I get it frequently and I'm only 19weeks x
Hi have they check your sugar I was like that and then they test me for diabetes and it came out positive
Thank you all I just went to sleep and Iit went away but I have my sugar test in 3 weeks so hopefully is good, thank you all!! :))
Call ur ob sounds like preeclampsia

I had same thing happen, doc said ur blood pressure drops here and there and it causes u to get dizzy, make sure u move slow especially when u stand up, hold on to something when u get up. And if ur feeling dizzy make sure u sit right away, and air helps, sit outside for minute or use a fan. And eating usually helps.
Happen to me while driving alone it was so scary

It's either ur anemic I get dizzy a lot to I got my blood work and I'm anemic . I was wondering why I would get dizzy a lot or could be you need to hydrate more drink more water relax . You can ask to your doctor to do some blood work  to make sure your ok. Hope everything is ok with you take care
It could be a number of things even a sinus infection has those symptoms. Even though you feel better make sure you let your doctor know about any episode of dizziness you feel.

question: Hi there I'm 25 weeks pregnant and all of the sudden I got really dizzy and wouldn't stop spinning I laid down in the couch but I feel like vomiting and really hot, the dizziness stopped already
title: got really dizzy
